questions.question: Why use half-Kelly in live trading?
options: To reduce drawdowns and estimation error impact
Because Kelly only works on coin flips
questions.explanation: Half-Kelly trades off some growth for much lower volatility and model risk.

questions.question: WinProb=0.55, Win/Loss=1.5:1. Kelly fraction f* = (b p − q)/b. Compute f*.
Why can negative net edge produce 0% Kelly?
questions.answer_text: Because (bp − q) ≤ 0 → optimal bet is not to bet.
